requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: Eastern Mind: The Lost Souls of Tong Nou

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 430 or AMD HD 6750 with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p/30 fps at low settings, 4GB Ram recommended for multiplayer
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD 4600 with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60 fps

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 - 6GB / AMD RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specs for Rift / Rift S / Vive. For minimum specs for Index / Vive Pro and other high resolution VR headsets, see recommended specs.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended specs for Rift / Rift S / Vive. Recommended specs for Index / Vive Pro and other high resolution VR headsets are i7-7700K and GTX 2070.
